statements: SELECT * FROM money_laundering_detection LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM money_laundering_detection WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM money_laundering_detection WHERE detection_category = 'Suspicious';
SELECT * FROM money_laundering_detection WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM money_laundering_detection ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM money_laundering_detection WHERE amount > 10000.00 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM money_laundering_detection WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM money_laundering_detection WHERE detection_category = 'Suspicious'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transactions_count FROM money_laundering_detection GROUP BY customer_id HAVING transactions_count > 5
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, detection_category FROM money_laundering_detection GROUP BY detection_category
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, email, last_login FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.user_id WHERE transactions.amount > 100 ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT username, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY username ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM money_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM money_transactions WHERE suspicious_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM money_transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM money_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND suspicious_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date, c.customer_name FROM money_transactions t JOIN customer_details c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 5000 AND c.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM ML_models WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.85;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT account_holder, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC, transaction_id
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type='Savings'
SELECT transactions.*, accounts.account_holder FROM transactions INNER JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id
SELECT flag_reason, flag_timestamp FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flag_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY flag_timestamp ASC
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM ML_models ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC, trained_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_accuracy FROM models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM alerts JOIN transactions ON alerts.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id WHERE alert_date > '2021-10-01'
SELECT model_name, model_version FROM models WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.9
